name: Battle-ry
description:
Play as a wizard protecting your more valuable possessions: 3 Batteries! Defend your battery from greedy robots, and fight off the angry ones. Background Story (Doesn't contribute too much to the gameplay but still, it feels incomplete without one): One day, you found a battery lying in the deep forest while you were gathering materials for the next experiment you were trying to do. Amazed by this mysterious technology, you decided to investigate on this. Finally, you successfully replicated another 2 batteries! However, the strong aura radiated from all 3 batteries attracted unnecessary trouble. To protect your batteries, you held your magic wand and fight off the robots.
